description: Long thin handle; thick blade, slightly curved on bottom near handle and top edge; protrusion facing downward on bottom end of blade
inscription: Inscription; Sticker (sticker no longer present as of 11/14/11)
markings: White paint, on blade, \'72\'; sitcker, on blade, under scotch tape, \'72\' green corrosion under tape; (Sticker and tape(?) no longer present as of 11/14/11)
title: Goldweight [Cleaver]
